statements: DELETE FROM advertising_campaign_performance WHERE total_impressions > 10000 AND total_clicks < 5000;
DELETE FROM advertising_campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE revenue > 1000 AND conversions > 10;
DELETE FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' OR budget < 5000;
DELETE FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'banner' AND ad_size = 'large';
DELETE FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'video' AND impressions > 1000;
DELETE FROM impressions WHERE location = 'New York';
